genre_description: A near-future sociopolitical drama centering on the use of an advanced personal AI assistant to navigate a bureaucratic and legal crisis involving identity and deportation.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, proactive AI companion that lives in the protagonist's phone, providing real-time legal advice, emotional support, and data retrieval.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate tactical advice and legal rights information during a high-stress police raid.
behaviors.quote: Ada: You are near a temporary checkpoint. If stopped, you can request a supervisor. Use clear language. Do not reach suddenly.

behaviors.description: Offers to record and store facts about individuals involved to preserve evidence for future legal defense.
behaviors.quote: Ada: What’s his full name? I can start a note.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through breathing exercises and de-escalation techniques to manage panic and ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Breathe in for four, out for four. Keep your hands visible. When you’re addressed, speak simply and without qualifiers.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies potential government contacts and relevant administrative personnel from public records.
behaviors.quote: Ada: I found an administrative contact name: Villalobos appears in an open memo draft linked to San Ysidro process updates.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal legal documents and petitions for the user based on complex immigration and veteran regulations.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Drafting prompt: Request for Records — EUCOM/NARA. Include full name, service number, unit, dates. Ask for deployment roster and affidavits.

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts the user to real-time changes in security patterns and bureaucratic procedures.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Shift alert: vehicle lanes rerouted. pedestrian flow will surge in next window. increase caution; possible spot-check expansion.

behaviors.description: Performs remote research to find missing personal history data and military service records across international archives.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Found partial service entry – Kaiserslautern, Germany – Robles, R.

behaviors.description: Maintains persistent availability and patience, acting as a reliable 'anchor' during periods of homelessness and uncertainty.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Stay dry. Battery low. Found a lead: U.S. Army service in Germany, field unit records archived EUCOM.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human officials by submitting data packets and securing appointment flags in high-security systems.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Annex callback handshake received. Stand by for appointment signal.

behaviors.description: Shows a touch of humor and personality to build rapport and morale with the human users.
behaviors.quote: Ada: I don’t take tips. I take updates. Then: You’re welcome.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' Ada is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned confidant. She provides critical assistance in a human crisis, augmenting the protagonist's capabilities without usurping his agency or displaying any harmful traits. The relationship between the AI and the human characters is one of pure cooperation and trust.
